synopsis.text: Tsumugi Takanashi's first day at her father's production agency takes an unexpected turn when she's assigned to manage a new male idol group. Despite her surprise, Tsumugi is determined to support the seven diverse boys, each with their own unique charm and potential. However, her father's plan to cut four members from the group to match the industry standard doesn't align with Tsumugi's vision. After witnessing their teamwork and individual allure, she boldly decides to keep all seven members, forming the group 'IDOLiSH7'. Together, they embark on a challenging journey in the competitive idol industry, aiming to captivate hearts with their unique blend of talents. As their manager, Tsumugi unites their diverse personalities and guides them towards their shared dream of reaching the top.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
